TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void NavigationProgressEventHandler(object sender, NavigationProgressEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed NavigationProgressEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub NavigationProgressEventHandler(sender As Object, e As NavigationProgressEventArgs)
public delegate void NavigationProgressEventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, NavigationProgressEventArgs ^ e);
type NavigationProgressEventHandler = delegate of obj * NavigationProgressEventArgs -> unit

Docs.summary: Представляет метод, который будет обрабатывать события .

remarks.format:
## Remarks Этот обработчик событий используется для следующих событий:
- <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.NavigationProgress?displayProperty=nameWithType>
- <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow.NavigationProgress?displayProperty=nameWithType>
- <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.NavigationProgress?displayProperty=nameWithType>
- <xref:System.Windows.Application.NavigationProgress?displayProperty=nameWithType>
